claim-text.content: 1. An optical device generating light by luminescence comprising a substrate having a front side and a backside, a waveguide, a pump light source and a photoluminescent layer,
wherein said waveguide is evanescently coupled with said photoluminescent layer;
wherein said pump light source is provided opposite to said photoluminescent layer at said backside of said substrate;
wherein said waveguide is positioned between said substrate and said photoluminescent layer;
wherein said pump light source is adapted to pump said photoluminescent layer to emit light such that at least some of said emitted light is evanescently coupled into said waveguide.

claim.body: waveguide is a low-order waveguide with a thickness in the range of 10 nm to 10 μm.

content: 2. The optical device according to
, wherein said waveguide is a low-order waveguide with a thickness in the range of 10 nm to 10 μm.

claim.body: the absorption and emission peak of light emitted by said photoluminescent layer are spectrally separated by at least 50 nm.

content: 3. The optical device according to
, wherein the absorption and emission peak of light emitted by said photoluminescent layer are spectrally separated by at least 50 nm.

claim.body: an encapsulation layer sealing said photoluminescent layer.

content: 4. The optical device according to
comprising an encapsulation layer sealing said photoluminescent layer.

claim.body: a spacer layer and a mirror, wherein said spacer layer has a thickness t SL and is disposed between said photoluminescent layer and said mirror, and wherein said mirror is adapted to reflect and re-inject at least some of the light pumped by said pump light source back into said photoluminescent layer.

content: 5. The optical device according to
, further comprising a spacer layer and a mirror, wherein said spacer layer has a thickness t

and is disposed between said photoluminescent layer and said mirror, and wherein said mirror is adapted to reflect and re-inject at least some of the light pumped by said pump light source back into said photoluminescent layer.

claim.body: thickness t SL is at least twice as large as the penetration depth L P of a wavefront field into said photoluminescent layer.

content: 6. The optical device according to
, wherein said thickness t
is at least twice as large as the penetration depth L
of a wavefront field into said photoluminescent layer.

claim.body: optical filter structured is positioned between said waveguide and said photoluminescent layer.

content: 8. The optical device according to
, wherein said optical filter structured is positioned between said waveguide and said photoluminescent layer.

claim.body: optical filter is positioned between said substrate and said waveguide.

content: 9. The optical device according to
, wherein said optical filter is positioned between said substrate and said waveguide.

one substrate having a front side and a backside, a plurality of waveguides, a plurality of pump light sources and a plurality of photoluminescent layers,

wherein said plurality of pump light sources are provided on said backside of said at least one substrate opposite to said plurality of photoluminescent layers, respectively;
